channel.title: Infylug on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Infylug on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Infyblogs and the internal BB were a great place to hang out! Over the last couple decades, haven’t quiteÂ  found a thriving network that is anywhere similar to those channels. Thinking of it, my foray into Linux was solely due to InfyLUG! Wonder if they still have those running!
